comment: Thank you for the heads up! What an impression to visualize: I wont put up with porn, nazi-socialist crap. Block/mute.
amr:
# ::snt Thank you for the heads up! What an impression to visualize: I wont put up with porn, nazi-socialist crap. Block/mute.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (h / heads-up))
      :snt2 (ii2 / impression-03
            :ARG1 (p / put-up-12
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (p2 / porn)
                        :op2 (c / crap
                              :mod (p3 / political-movement
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Nazism"))
                              :mod (p4 / political-movement
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "socialism")))))
            :degree (s / so)
            :ARG1-of (v / visualize-01))
      :snt3 (s2 / slash
            :op1 (b / block-01)
            :op2 (m2 / mute)))

comment: Using this kind of language is uncalled for and can be harmful, as well as triggering. Please refrain and be kind.
amr:
# ::snt Using this kind of language is uncalled for and can be harmful, as well as triggering. Please refrain and be kind.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / call-03
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG1 (l / language
                              :mod (k / kind
                                    :mod (t / this)))))
            :op2 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (h / harmful-02
                              :ARG0 u)
                        :op2 (t2 / trigger-01
                              :ARG0 u))))
      :snt2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (r / refrain-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you))
            :op2 (k2 / kind-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y)))

comment: Language attacking sexual orientation is unacceptable. Please refrain from future use.

            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
